about_the_game:
How to play:





Game introduction:
The best jigsaw puzzle jigsaw workshop, super simple operation to create your Jigsaw to share with the whole world!
After subscription, it can not only be used in games, but also can be saved as local pictures.
Refreshing operation and pleasing to the eye! Leisure and fun!
The picture is released in the form of free DLC. Pay attention to subscriptions!

Commit to all DLC free updates in the future. But the original price is likely to rise.

Tips:
Press the Ctrl+ left mouse button to add pictures and upload them in batches.
Support any size JPG and PNG picture formats within 3MB.
Importing too many oversized pictures may cause the program to crash, depending on the configuration of the computer.
Abnormal situation, delete the large picture can be.
DLC is free and can be subscribed according to personal preference. If you want to hide the DLC content, you can check the DLC in the inventory.

About the Game

After subscription, it can not only be used in games, but also can be saved as local pictures.
Refreshing operation and pleasing to the eye! Leisure and fun!
The picture is released in the form of free DLC. Pay attention to subscriptions!

Commit to all DLC free updates in the future. But the original price is likely to rise.

Tips:
Press the Ctrl+ left mouse button to add pictures and upload them in batches.
Support any size JPG and PNG picture formats within 3MB.
Importing too many oversized pictures may cause the program to crash, depending on the configuration of the computer.

DLC is free and can be subscribed according to personal preference. If you want to hide the DLC content, you can check the DLC in the inventory.

reviews:
“Happy with the global partners, enjoy the fun of sharing,Pleasure Puzzle:Workshop is a wonderful creative workshop to share the masterpiece!”

“Still familiar with the simple rules of jigsaw puzzle, or the taste of relaxation. A very pure jigsaw puzzle, in addition to its own official pictures (included in the free DLC), but also adds the function of uploading pictures, players can upload and share their favorite pictures at will, truly achieve a shared picture, enjoy.”
